description:
Kasey Summers is pleased to present to market this spacious family home. With four large bedrooms, two bathrooms, plus Theatre and Games rooms and a large outdoor entertaining area. All located on a large 603sqm elevated block of land!

Enter this large family home into the inviting entry with elevated ceilings that continue throughout this home and create a spacious flow. Walk through to the heart of the home where you will find the kitchen with the laundry practically positioned behind, with plentiful storage including overhead cupboards. The kitchen is sure to impress with spacious design, stainless steel appliances, dishwasher and microwave recess and double fridge/freezer recess. All maximising function and style in this neutrally styled kitchen. The kitchen overlooks the central dining room and the spacious family room, with reverse cycle air conditioning.

The Theatre is perfectly positioned front and centre in the home with double doors, so you can shut off the rest of the home and enjoy that home theatre experience. The huge games room is located at the rear of the home and is the perfect space for a pool table, or kids play room, with double doors so you can minimise noise.

The large master bedroom is located at the front of the home and includes a walk-in-robe and ensuite with glass shower screen and generous vanity. Complete with reverse cycle air conditioning and a fan. The other bedrooms are generous in size and complete with fans, carpets and double built-in-robes and serviced by the light and bright bathroom off the hallway.

Outdoors you will find the perfect place to entertain, with an alfresco sheltered on three sides, which leads out to the large gabled patio, paved for the ultimate low-maintenance lifestyle and surrounded by lush planting set amongst established fruit trees.

Other features include:
• Double lock up garage
• Gated side access
• Two garden sheds
• Rheem instantaneous gas hot water
• Gas bayonet to family room
• Tiles to the living areas and wood look floors to Theatre
• Verticals and venetians throughout

All this located in close proximity to:
• Success Primary School 1.5km's
• Aubin Grove train station 1.7km's
• Jandakot Primary School 1.9km's
• Cockburn Gateway Shopping Centre 2km's
• Cockburn Train Station 3km's
• Emmanuel Catholic College 3.3km's

This property is just perfect for busy families or investors who are seeking a low maintenance property. It won't last long in this hot market! For more information please contact Kasey Summers on 0409 018 025 or kasey@semplepg.com.au

Disclaimer: Whilst every care has been taken in the preparation of the marketing for this property, accuracy cannot be guaranteed. Prospective buyers should make their own enquiries to satisfy themselves on all pertinent matters. Details herein do not constitute any representation by the Seller or the Seller's Agent and are expressly excluded from any contract.
